name: Stanley McChrystal
role: Commander of U.S. Forces in Afghanistan
summary: Former four-star general who led Joint Special Operations Command and called Trump 'immoral' and unrepresentative of American values.

keyStatements.quote: Our president must be more than a malleable reflection of the public's passions.

timeline.event: Took command of Joint Special Operations Command
Appointed Commander of U.S. Forces Afghanistan

timeline.significance: Left after Rolling Stone article controversy
Crossed party lines to oppose Trump

credibility.background: Four-star general who revolutionized Joint Special Operations Command, credited with killing of Osama bin Laden
